00020 using namespace std;
00021 
00022 const int NUM_MODULES = 15;
00023 //give each module a number
00024 
00025 
00026 //class declaration
00027 class Permission
00028 {
00029     public:
00030         Permission(wxString loadAuthCode, wxString loadPermCode);
00031         ~Permission();
00032         bool isEnabled(int id);     //module-specific permissions request
00033         bool isAuthorized(int id);  //module-specific authorization request
00034         void enable(int id);        //module-specific enable
00035         void disable(int id);       //module-specific disable
00036         bool setGlobalAuthorized(wxString newAuthCode);//set everything
00037         void setGlobalEnabled(wxString newEnableCode);
00038         long getGlobalEnabled();    //what should be visible
00039         long getGlobalAuthorized(); //what's allowed to be turned on/off
00040 
00041         //returns the string that matches the enumeration
00042         wxString getPermName(int permEnum);
00043 
00044     private:
00045         bitset <NUM_MODULES> status;//array for holding module status
00046         bitset <NUM_MODULES> auth;  //array for holding what's allowed
00047         long permCode;              //int for holding permissions code #
00048         long authCode;              //int for holding authorized code #
00049         wxArrayString permNames;    //matches the enumerated perms with a name 
00050 };
